segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling onto the floor, forming a puddle, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she’s just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s lost in thought or just really dedicated to drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to no good, sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping over, and he’ll fall right into that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a disaster waiting to happen, and no one’s paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should say something, but I don’t want to interrupt the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is both amusing and terrifying at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
